parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.52

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Positioning

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Gets rotation info of an <tt>ST_PICTURE</tt> control.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[ctrlAngle]] control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control : [[Control]]  - picture control

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] - format [angle, centerX, centerY]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ctrlAngle]] _control;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlSetAngle]]
</value></part></template></root>
